mapper.select: select user_ID, user_Name, user_sex, user_type, user_code from user where user_type = 1
select user_ID, user_Name, user_sex, user_type, user_code from user where user_name like concat('%',#{key},'%') and user_type = 1

select u.user_ID, u.user_Name, u.user_type, u.user_code, c.Clazz_ID, c.Clazz_name from user u left join user_clazz uc on u.user_ID = uc.user_ID left join clazz c on uc.Clazz_ID = c.Clazz_ID where u.user_ID = #{tid}
mapper.insert: insert into user(user_Name, user_Password, user_sex, user_type, user_code) values (#{userName}, #{userPass}, #{userSex}, #{userType}, #{userCode})
